column5: I'm trying to find a lake map showing the depths for Little Vermillion Lake which is about 15-20 miles north of Red Lake. I've searched a lot of map web sites, but can't seem to find anything. Please help. Thanks
Check with your camp operator. Fiinding good maps of lakes in northwest Canada is tough. Why? Because the fishing is so good you don't need a great map. :)You might check out bait shops also.
